Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class VehicleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.VehicleBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitBuilder
    public class VehicleBuilder
extends Object
implements UnitBuilder
    A vehicle builder. This implements the builder pattern to assist in making vehicle units.

      • build

        public Unit build​(char id,
                  HexMap map,
                  Hex hex,
                  Direction facing)
        Build the vehicle. This uses all of the settings set on the builder to this point.
        Multiple vehicles's can be built from a single builder.
        Specified by:
        build in interface UnitBuilder
        Parameters:
        id - unique, single character id of unit
        map - map to place the unit on
        hex - location to put the unit
        facing - the facing direction of the new unit
        Returns:
        a new vehicle using the settings from the builder and the given location and id.
